'''Lonely Graveyard''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Graveyard Haunt]] on the island of [[Angler's Grave]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Only one crewmate is allowed to be on the upper graveyard at the same time.</big>
